Example 2: Questioning with reanswer time

You can set a wait time after that the question(s) can be reanswered. 

<div id="question_example2" swa="Question FROM ../data/question/examplequestions2.json"></div>
        

var example2_options = {};
example2_options.timeToReanswer = 1;
example2_options.afterSaveTxt = 'Thank you for your input!';
